sentences.en: A testator may revoke or alter a will he previously made.
sentences.cn: 遗嘱人可以撤销、变更自己所立的遗嘱.

sentences.en: An election agent may only revoke the appointment of a polling agent on a counting agent.
sentences.cn: 选举代理人只可撤销监察投票代理人及监察点票代理人的委任.

sentences.en: Candidate may revoke the appointment of any type of agent at any time.
sentences.cn: 候选人可撤销任何类别的代理人的委任.

sentences.en: Cannot grant, deny or revoke permissions to or from special roles.
sentences.cn: 无法对特殊角色授予 、 拒绝或废除权限.

sentences.en: Could not revoke login access from'% s '.
sentences.cn: 未能废除'' %1 !''的登录访问权.

sentences.en: Do not allow anyone to revoke my enterprise server licensor certificate.
sentences.cn: 不允许任何人吊销我的企业服务器许可方证书.

sentences.en: If we have a repeat of this situation , I will revoke your probation.
sentences.cn: 如果继续这样的话, 我会撤销你的缓刑.

sentences.en: Q 12. Can I apply to revoke another person Registered Design?
sentences.cn: 我可以申请撤销他人已注册的外观设计 吗 ?

sentences.en: Remarriage would revoke all previous wills.
sentences.cn: 再婚会使原有的一切遗嘱失效.

sentences.en: Revoke resolutions reached at legal meetings.
sentences.cn: 一撤销法定会议之决议.

sentences.en: The intention to revoke a will.
The temporary suspension period, investors can continue to declare, you can also revoke declaration.
sentences.cn: 临时停牌期间, 投资者可以继续申报, 也可以撤销申报.

sentences.en: The university may revoke my diploma.
sentences.cn: 大学可能吊销我的毕业证书.

sentences.en: Their work permits have been revoked.
sentences.cn: 他们的工作许可证被吊销了。

sentences.en: We hereby revoke the agreement of January 1 st 1982.
sentences.cn: 我们特此宣告1982年1月1日的协议无效.

sentences.en: We hereby revoke the agreement of May 8, 2004.
sentences.cn: 我方特此宣告于2004年5月8日签订的合同无效.

words.tran_cn: 可取消的，可废止的；可撤回的

trans.tran_cn: 撤回, 废除, 宣告无效
trans.tran_en: to officially state that a law, decision, or agreement is no longer effective
to officially state that a law, decision, or agreement is no longer effective
